summary: AXA is a major insurance provider in Southeast Asia. This project was aimed to unify and serve business and data related requirements of all the new projects of the region through a centralized service/api repository.

contributions.description: Liaison with client solution, business, and data architect to identify and finalize the candidate services for the repository
Design the data and api platform on top of hybrid cloud architecture (AwS and PCF) using microservices principles.
Responsible for the technical delivery and single point of contact for design and technical issues from Cognizant end.
Part of clientâ€™s group architecture review board (GARB) and responsible for service identification, prioritization, and design, which will be delivered through the project.

recognition.description: Spotlight award for the quarter form Cognizant.
